title: List of Chelsea F.C. managers - Wikipedia
snippet: Chelsea have had 32 permanent managers/head coaches (of whom four also served as player-manager), six interim managers and six caretakers. Ron Suart has served as both caretaker and interim manager.

title: Chelsea Coaching Staff - The Chelsea Chronicle
snippet: Chelsea is one of the most successful English football clubs with an expert coaching staff beside manager Enzo Maresca. So, who now features as part of his staff at Stamford Bridge?

title: Enzo Maresca - Wikipedia
snippet: He was awarded with another EFL Manager of the Month in April, his fourth in the season, for collecting 15 points in seven games. On 3 June 2024, Premier League club Chelsea announced that Maresca would be joining as head coach on 1 July, signing ...
